page.title: 10AMENITIES-LT.GADDESDEN AREA
page.content: There is the Deer Leap swimming pool. It costs 50p for children to get in, 75p for adults, 30p to spectate. You can stay all day till 7 p.m. It is an outdoor pool. It has a shop which sells articles for water play. There is also a riding school. It is expensive, but good. It is Â£6.50 for an hour (for a child), and Â£7.50 for an adult with a private lesson. It is Â£5.50 for an hour with a class and Â£4.50 for half an hour with the class. There is the Post Office, the Bridgewater Pub, the playing field with the tennis courts, golf course, bowling green, sports pavilion, telephone exchange, School, Deer Leap Garage, Village Hall which has a stage, and is used for the Drama Club, for parties and Play Group. A Youth Club meets each week.
